location: Zhongcheng Road Section 1, Tongcheng Mansion (銅城華廈), near Takashimaya
notes: Large 4-bedroom unit with elevator access, direct landlord rental with cooking permitted and natural gas. Good location near MRT stations and Takashimaya shopping. Unable to assess modernity or baby safety features (balcony railings, sharp corners) without images. Note: pets prohibited, 2-month deposit required.
